formatted_address: Block 6 Level 1, (outside Admissions Office) Singapore General Hospital, Singapore 169608
name: SGH Garden & Park

reviews.text: Located next to the Admissions Office and Block 4 Retail Pharmacy. A small-scale garden and rest area filled with greenery. The natural sources of light give this space a lively feeling. Free Wireless@SGx wifi signal coverage is strong and consistent. Food court, takeaway food kiosks, cafe restaurants, ATMs, SAM Kiosk & public toilets are just around the corner.

vicinity: Block 6 Level 1, (outside Admissions Office) Singapore General Hospital, Singapore
